label: [{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"滤过性病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":43,"text":"地方流行性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"神经系统","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎是由一种滤过性病毒引起的、主要侵害雏鸡神经系统的一种地方流行性传染病。

label: [{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: (一)流行病学特征：以冬春季多发，1～2日龄雏鸡易感，7～14日龄雏鸡最易感。

label: [{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":36,"end":46,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 其传播途径，一是经卵传播，种鸡带毒，所产种蛋也带毒，孵出的雏鸡先天性感染雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎毒而发病；

label: [{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 二是水平传播，雏鸡患病后由粪便排毒，污染环境，被污染的饲料、饮水、用具、人员等成为传递因素，经消化道感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":9,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎传播迅速，雏鸡的发病率与死亡率较高，一旦发病，损失严重。

label: [{"start":8,"end":17,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"神经系统紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"紊乱","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"神经系统","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (二)临床症状：雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎的主要表现是神经系统紊乱。初期，见病雏精神沉郁；

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"跌倒","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"伏卧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"侧卧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"前后倾斜","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"左右晃动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"蹲伏","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 随后出现共济失调，前后倾斜左右晃动，跌倒，伏卧或侧卧，或跗关节着地呈蹲伏姿势；

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"反应迟钝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"全身颤抖","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":16,"text":"转圈运动","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"头颈扭转","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":17,"end":18,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"扭转","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 进而反应迟钝，全身颤抖，转圈运动或头颈扭转。

label: [{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":28,"end":36,"text":"产蛋率暂时性下降","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 水平感染时，症状多不明显，常被人忽略。成年鸡感染时，只有产蛋率暂时性下降，耐过之后，产蛋率逐渐恢复。

label: [{"start":8,"end":17,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":52,"text":"不甚明显的白斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":81,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":75,"end":79,"text":"肿瘤病变","labels":["disease"]},{"start":63,"end":72,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (三)剖检变化：雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎不具有肉眼可见的病理变化，有时能见到心肌、肝脏切面上出现不甚明显的白斑、不足以作为诊断依据。雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎与具有肿瘤病变的鸡病鉴别。

label: [{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"姑息疗法","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"加强护理","labels":["control"]},{"start":36,"end":45,"text":"创造优越的环境条件","labels":["control"]}]
text: 二、防制措施;雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎无药可治，只可姑息疗法，对病雏加强护理，创造优越的环境条件，顺其自然，多数可以恢复，继续生长发育。

label: [{"start":4,"end":13,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"更新鸡群","labels":["control"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"淘汰病鸡","labels":["control"]},{"start":29,"end":35,"text":"全场彻底消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 为了防止雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎的延续，最好更新鸡群或淘汰病鸡，全场彻底消毒，不再从有病种鸡场进种蛋和雏鸡。

label: [{"start":7,"end":20,"text":"执行严格的兽医卫生防疫制度","labels":["control"]},{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 加强饲养管理，执行严格的兽医卫生防疫制度，杜绝水平传染，确保鸡群健康。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"免疫接种","labels":["control"]}]
text: 种鸡视情况进行雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎的免疫接种，保护鸡群，提供优质种蛋和雏鸡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"禽传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"流行性震颤","labels":["disease"]},{"start":26,"end":32,"text":"病毒性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":39,"end":40,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":41,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"头颈震颤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"震颤","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 禽传染性脑脊髓炎俗称流行性震颤，是一种主要侵害雏鸡的病毒性传染病，以共济失调和头颈震颤为主要特征。

label: [{"start":6,"end":7,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"雉","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"火鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"珍珠鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"雏禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":23,"end":31,"text":"禽传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 自然感染见于鸡、雉、火鸡、鹌鹑、珍珠鸡等。鸡对禽传染性脑脊髓炎最易感。各个日龄均可感染，但一般雏禽才有明显症状。

label: [{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"肠道感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肠道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 此病具有很强的传染性，病毒通过肠道感染后，经粪便排毒，病毒在粪便中能存活相当长的时间。

label: [{"start":59,"end":61,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":57,"text":"雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 因此，污染的饲料、饮水、垫草、孵化器和育雏设备都可能成为病毒传播的来源，如果没有特殊的预防措施，雏鸡传染性脑脊髓炎可在鸡群中传播。

label: [{"start":6,"end":14,"text":"禽传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 在传播方式上禽传染性脑脊髓炎以垂直传播为主，也能通过接触进行水平传播。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"产蛋鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 产蛋鸡感染后，一般无明显临床症状，但在感染急性期可将病毒排入蛋中，这些蛋虽然大都能孵化出雏鸡，但雏鸡在出壳时或出生后数日内呈现症状。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 这些被感染的雏鸡粪便中含有大量病毒。可通过接触感染其他雏鸡，造成重大经济损失。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"禽传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 禽传染性脑脊髓炎流行无明显的季节性，一年四季均可发生，以冬春季节稍多。

label: [{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"易感鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":27,"text":"发病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 发病及死亡率与鸡群的易感鸡多少、病原的毒力高低、发病鸡的日龄大小而有所不同。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 雏鸡发病率一般为40%～60%,死亡率为10%～25%,甚至更高。

label: [{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"弱雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"神经症状","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 此病主要见于3周龄以内的雏鸡，虽然出雏时有较多的弱雏并可能有一些病雏，但有神经症状的病雏大多在1~2周龄出现。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"迟钝","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"不愿走动而蹲坐","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":46,"end":54,"text":"以跗关节着地走路","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":55,"end":62,"text":"走动时摇摆不定","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":63,"end":70,"text":"向前猛冲后倒下","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":35,"end":38,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":50,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 病雏最初表现为迟钝，继而出现共济失调，表现为雏鸡不愿走动而蹲坐在自身的跗关节上。驱赶时可勉强以跗关节着地走路，走动时摇摆不定，向前猛冲后倒下。

label: [{"start":6,"end":11,"text":"双侧腿麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"走路跛行","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"一侧腿麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":8,"end":9,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 或出现一侧或双侧腿麻痹，一侧腿麻痹时走路跛行。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"双侧腿麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"麻痹","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"完全不能站立","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":14,"end":26,"text":"双腿呈一前一后的劈叉姿势","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"双腿倒向一侧","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":2,"end":3,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"双腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"双腿","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 双侧腿麻痹时则完全不能站立，双腿呈一前一后的劈叉姿势，或双腿倒向一侧。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肌肉震颤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"共济失调","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"震颤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":39,"text":"阵发性震颤","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"频率较高","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"翼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"头颈部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 肌肉震颤大多在出现共济失调之后才发生，在腿、翼尤其是头颈部可见明显的阵发性震颤、频率较高。在病鸡受惊扰如给水、加料、倒提时更为明显。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"存活鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"浅蓝色褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":23,"text":"浅蓝色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"眼球增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"失明","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":19,"text":"眼的晶状体混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"眼的晶状体","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"眼球","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 部分存活鸡可见一侧或两侧眼的晶状体混浊或浅蓝色褪色，眼球增大及失明。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":24,"text":"腺胃的肌层有细小的灰白区","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"灰白区","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":17,"text":"腺胃的肌层","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"小脑水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":51,"text":"非化脓性脑炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":64,"text":"脑部血管有明显的管套现象","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":60,"end":62,"text":"管套","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"小脑","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":56,"text":"脑部血管","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡唯一可见的肉眼变化是腺胃的肌层有细小的灰白区，个别雏鸡可发现小脑水肿。组织学变化表现为非化脓性脑炎，脑部血管有明显的管套现象；

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"脊髓背根神经炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":11,"text":"脊髓根","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":13,"end":16,"text":"神经原","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脊髓背根神经炎，脊髓根中的神经原周围有时聚集大量淋巴细胞。

label: [{"start":8,"end":17,"text":"神经原中央虎斑溶解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"溶解","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":28,"text":"神经小胶质细胞弥漫性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":34,"text":"结节性浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"小脑分子层","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":8,"end":15,"text":"神经原中央虎斑","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":25,"text":"神经小胶质细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 小脑分子层易发生神经原中央虎斑溶解，神经小胶质细胞弥漫性或结节性浸润。

label: [{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"增生","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"聚集","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":37,"text":"腺胃肌肉层淋巴细胞浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":37,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"肌胃肌层","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":18,"text":"胰脏淋巴小结","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":35,"text":"腺胃肌肉层淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 此外尚有心肌、肌胃肌层和胰脏淋巴小结的增生、聚集以及腺胃肌肉层淋巴细胞浸润。

label: [{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 根据疾病仅发生于3周龄以下的雏鸡，无明显肉眼变化。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"脑水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"瘫痪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"头颈震颤","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"震颤","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":40,"text":"一过性产蛋下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":2,"end":3,"text":"脑","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":11,"end":12,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 偶见脑水肿，而以瘫痪和头颈震颤为主要症状，药物防治无效，种鸡曾出现一过性产蛋下降等，即可做出初步诊断。

label: [{"start":0,"end":8,"text":"禽传染性脑脊髓炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":24,"end":31,"text":"将发病鸡群扑杀","labels":["control"]},{"start":32,"end":39,"text":"进行无害化处理","labels":["control"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"发病鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 禽传染性脑脊髓炎尚无有效的治疗方法。一般地说，应将发病鸡群扑杀并进行无害化处理。

label: [{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"将病鸡隔离","labels":["control"]},{"start":15,"end":22,"text":"给予舒适的环境","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":33,"text":"提供充足的饮水和饲料","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 如有特殊需要，也可将病鸡隔离，给予舒适的环境，提供充足的饮水和饲料。

label: [{"start":0,"end":12,"text":"饲料和饮水中添加维生素E","labels":["control"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"维生素E","labels":["drug"]},{"start":13,"end":18,"text":"维生素B1","labels":["drug"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 饲料和饮水中添加维生素E、维生素B1,避免尚能走动的鸡践踏病鸡等，可减少发病与死亡。

label: [{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":8,"end":15,"text":"防止从疫区引进","labels":["control"]},{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"加强消毒与隔离","labels":["control"]}]
text: 加强消毒与隔离，防止从疫区引进种蛋与种鸡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"活毒疫苗免疫","labels":["control"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"饮水接种","labels":["control"]},{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"活苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"活毒疫苗","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 活毒疫苗免疫：一种用1143毒株制成的活苗，通过饮水接种。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":20,"end":25,"text":"脊髓炎病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡接种疫苗后1~2周排出的粪便中能分离出脊髓炎病毒。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":38,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]}]
text: 这种疫苗可通过自然扩散感染，且具有一定的毒力，故小于8周龄、处于产蛋期的鸡群不能接种这种疫苗，以免引起发病。

label: [{"start":10,"end":11,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"接种疫苗","labels":["control"]}]
text: 建议用于10周以上的鸡，但不能迟于开产前4周接种疫苗；

label: [{"start":19,"end":21,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 接种后4周内所产的蛋不能用于孵化，以防雏鸡由于垂直传播而发病。

label: [{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"活毒疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"鸡痘弱毒疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":19,"text":"二联苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":39,"end":43,"text":"翼膜制种","labels":["control"]}]
text: 一种活毒疫苗常与鸡痘弱毒疫苗制成二联苗，一般于10周龄以上至开产前4周之间进行翼膜制种。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"灭活疫苗免疫","labels":["control"]},{"start":32,"end":37,"text":"油乳剂疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"灭活疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"野毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":11,"end":16,"text":"鸡胚适应毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"鸡胚","labels":["type"]}]
text: 灭活疫苗免疫：用野毒或鸡胚适应毒接种SPF鸡胚，取其病料灭活制成油乳剂疫苗。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":26,"end":31,"text":"脑脊髓炎病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 这种疫苗安全性好，接种后不排毒、不带毒，特别适用于无脑脊髓炎病史的鸡群。可于种鸡开产前18~20周接种。
